title: FOAM Trust Zone Program FAQ
body:
The goal of the Trust Zone program is to have select partners run the FOAM protocol in different geographical environments and test different zone configurations. **The selected participant partners will also assemble the current prototype of the Zone Anchor, secure a minimum of four locations for installation, run localization experiments and submit the results for evaluation.**

This is a beta testing program for early qualified stakeholders aligned with the mission of the protocol to contribute to refining and defining needed features. The partner participation process will be to maintain your own Zone with a focus on building a high quality fault tolerant network that will seed the network’s initial growth and security.

Until now, we’ve been running these experiments in a closed network. **We are excited to announce that it is now time to open up this experiment by adding community run Zones!**

[https://mirror.xyz/foamspace.eth/Awq0ItP4fxvg7_HAZA3gNQnNgoE_7Ogj_4n2EkDed-I](https://mirror.xyz/foamspace.eth/Awq0ItP4fxvg7_HAZA3gNQnNgoE_7Ogj_4n2EkDed-I)


---

*Additional information about the Trust Zone Program can be found in the **Brochure Overview** linked below*

[https://foam.space/publicAssets/FOAM_Trust_Zone_Overview.pdf](https://foam.space/publicAssets/FOAM_Trust_Zone_Overview.pdf)

### What is a Trust zone?

A Trust Zone is a beta radio network run by partner participants to further test and further develop the FOAM Proof of Location protocol. A Trust Zone also serves as a development platform to implement new features and run localization experiments.

A Trust Zone requires a minimum of 4 radios installed with quality line of site visibility to each other. **A Zone maintains a quorum over time and space across their location horizon by upholding accuracy and precision, Trust Zones will play a crucial role in verifying the growth of the network and uphold sovereign and secure location services.** This is infrastructure for the future.

### What kind of locations are qualified and what are the basic requirements?

The goal of the Trust Zone program is to test FOAM technology is as many types of environments as possible. A diverse set of test data will further refine localization performance. Participants in the Trust Zone program are welcome to build their Zones across urban and rural environments.

In addition to line of sight between four Zone Anchors, basic requirements for a Zone regardless of environment type is for each Zone Anchor radio to have access to power and internet backhaul.

### What is the size and distance between Zone Anchors required?

![The Current FOAM test Zone in the Brooklyn Navy Yard has a maximum distance of 1 kilometer between Zone Anchors ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IBdRjbc0QI6HTbEMysTBs.png?height=1672&width=2432)

**An additional goal of the Trust Zone testing program is to further understand this question.** As a radio based system, the performance of the network is impacted by a number of factors such as signal obstruction from buildings. Each Trust Zone will have its own limits on distance and size and  will need to take this into consideration. **The optimal zone configuration for each Trust zone will take some trial and error.**

While the radio’s used in each Zone Anchor can transmit up to multiple miles, within FOAM the localization performance is directly correlated to how consistently each of the four or more nodes receive each others radio packets. The further away Zone Anchors are from each other the higher the chance there will be packet loss, degrading performance of localization. **Participants will contribute in determining a system wide maximum zone as a best practice.**

The Current FOAM test Zone in the Brooklyn Navy Yard has a maximum distance of 1 kilometer between Zone Anchors, in a dense industrial environment, as a starting baseline data point. When building a Zone tests are required before committing to the selected locations. One of the first steps is to run a visibility and packet align test across the Zone Anchors to assess the location's viability. **Partner participants will work with the Foamspace team on assessing the results of these tests before approving a permanent installation of the Zone.**

### Can I build my own hardware?

Yes, initial selected parter participants for the Trust Zone program are highly encouraged to build and assemble their own Zone Anchors. **The Foamspace team will be able to provide key custom components as well as components that may be hard to find due to supply chain challenges.** Participants will have the option to receive pre-assembled hardware on a need be basis.

*The first Zone Anchor product for purchase is currently under development and will be made available in the next phase of the program.*

![FOAM Zone Anchor prototype that can be assembled by participants ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w8dELFUSSc48YmF5iBejh.png?height=1338&width=1932)

### I do not own the buildings I am looking to install Zone Anchors on, or I am setting up a Zone without buildings, what do I need to do?

If you are planning on installing Zone Anchors on buildings that you do not own, you will need to arrange authorization or procure a lease with the building owner. **Each partner participant will have to solve for this based on their circumstances.** In general *Universities are great hosts* for Trust Zones as an agreement is needed with only one entity for multiple buildings.

In areas without tall buildings, such as suburban or rural environments, for good radio visibility, properly secured and legally set up **antenna masts or small scale towers can be used to mount the Zone Anchor** and/or its antennas. Installing such a set up on top of elevated areas such as hills is also a recommended solution

### What types of Antennas will I need?

Currently, **a single Zone Anchor requires two antennas that operate in LoRa frequency band**, with quality signal fidelity driving localization. Example recommendations are the following antennas based on visibility between static nodes and installation topography:

1. Low visibility and/or Urban landscapes: [9 dBi Panel Antenna](https://www.l-com.com/wireless-antenna-900-mhz-9-dbi-heavy-duty-flat-panel-antenna?utm_source=gristleking&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=best+antenna+for+helium), [PulseLarsen 11 dBi Yagi Antenna](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/pulselarsen-antennas/YA5900W/9646435)
2. High variability in elevation between node installations: [RAKWireless 3 dBi Fiberglass Antenna](https://store.rakwireless.com/collections/accessories/products/fiber-glass-antenna?variant=39705894518982)
3. High visibility and open landscapes: [Taoglass 8 dBi Omnidirectional Antenna](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/taoglas-limited/OMB-915-B08F21/8275277)

For example, in a densely packed city, where visibility between the nodes is low, a directional antenna can be used as a Receiving antenna and an omnidirectional antenna can be used a Transmitting antenna.

A 50 ohms LMR 400 coaxial cable, that is rated for outdoor usage, is recommended to connect the antenna to the Zone Anchor: [Linx Technologies RF cable assembly](https://www.mouser.com/ProductDetail/Linx-Technologies/CSO-NM-1200-NM?qs=vmHwEFxEFR91sLC9C6UcaQ%3D%3D)

Based off of the preliminary locations submitted to host your Trust Zone when applying, we will work with you to select and assess antenna type, gain and elevation required for your zone.

### How will I manage and interact with my Trust Zone?

**FOAM has developed a web application called Hostel for managing experiments and viewing results.** Hostel is a suite of tools for: remotely configuring radios and the Zone, executing and monitoring experiments, data pipelines for processing localization data, dashboards for quality assessment and visualizations as well as health monitors for the status of all of the nodes.

![Hostel, Web Application for managing your Trust Zone ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MBBLXc73cjKjnRPXS139_.png?height=758&width=1208)

### How much power is required? Do I need a license? Will this be disruptive to the energy draw and power bill for the building?

The current Zone Anchor prototype is a low power device. It draws a maximum current of 0.9 A and 0.4 A when idle at 12 V, leading to a power requirement of 11 W. You do not need a license to operate this device as it uses unlicensed frequency band for wireless communication. This will not cause disruption to the power consumption of the building. It is equivalent to having a phone charger plugged into a wall socket.

### How much space/ what is the footprint of the installation?

The current Zone Anchor prototype enclosure has the dimensions: 11.750"L X 9.980"W. The wall-mounted installation will span 2 ft by 1 ft. Antenna masts can be attached to this installation.

### What are the technical requirements to participate?

* Basic DIY competency (using hand tools, following instructions)
* Basic technology competence (connecting cables, installing software, etc.)
* Familiarity with the Linux shell preferable, though should be rarely required. (ability to SSH into devices)
* Experience interacting with web3 protocols and or operating blockchain infrastructure preferable
* LTE network subscription with SIM cards

### What is the duration of time Trust Zone program?

**The initial engagement for partner participants working with the existing Zone Anchor prototype will be for 6 months**. The program will further expand to increase the number of participants and features tested and include the initial Zone Anchor product currently under manufacturing development.

### What are FOAM's expectations of a Partner, number of experiments/tests, hours per week?

The time required to set up a Trust Zone will vary by each participants circumstances. The program is broken down into stages, across applying, sourcing locations, assembling hardware and initial tests before installation. We will provide time estimates for these stages with all associated resources and guides.

**Once a Trust Zone is established, operating stable and permanently installed the expectation is that participants are running experiments to localize devices within their zone, contributing to analyzing the results and providing feedback and feature requests.** We estimate a minimum of 5 hours a week will be required to operate, maintain and troubleshoot an established Trust Zone.

We expect participant teams to communicate with us throughout the process, including but not limited to providing qualitative and quantitative feedback about the protocol, products and experience as well as creating content and documenting the program experience.

![Multiple Mounting Options](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U32cMCs2ZTspQ40lq0aAw.png?height=1672&width=2432)

### What are the benefits to participating in the Trust Zone program?

As a participant in the Trust Zone program you will be eligible for earning FOAM token rewards. The Trust Zone program is designed to attract and align stakeholders that believe Proof of Location is a critical prerequisite for the further development of Web3 use cases, accelerating a world where smart contracts interact with the physical world.

**Participating in the program puts you at the center of FOAMs development and steward new forms of location technology. You will have a key role in shaping the development of the protocol and needed features while helping to refine localization results.**

Trust Zone participants will be in a position to be the first Zone Operators when the network further opens to stake FOAM tokens, earn mining rewards and offer location services to customers.

### I am interested in applying to participate, what are the next steps?

Registration is temporally closed as we process the first batch, sign up for waitlist registration below. We want to hear from you! 

[https://cqnllvd8gl2.typeform.com/to/EKlKIoEe](https://cqnllvd8gl2.typeform.com/to/EKlKIoEe)

title: Mint Cabin’s Writing NFTs: Access Masterclasses, Support Our Contributors & Cast Your Vote for the Future of Work in Web3
body:
🎉 To celebrate Cabin’s first birthday, we’re proud to announce that we partnered with Mirror to publish three of our most popular articles as NFTs.

Mirror’s crowdfunding platform powered Cabin initial crowdfund. Since then, it’s been our home to build the DAO in public. Today, we’re taking that partnership to the next level.

**From now until the end of May, members, fans, and lurkers of the Cabin community have the unique opportunity to [collect](https://g.mirror.xyz/rq__HuWEfylTTjaYeMMkheYvCEV3obxuW09STRjLqG4) and mint three of our most popular articles as [Writing NFTs](https://dev.mirror.xyz/5gt60vKFJZ_tR1BjoJ7-Y0sNw7REebStHjzFU5x73J0) and directly support the Cabin contributors behind each article.** Here’s the exciting part: Every NFT minted is a ticket to an intimate masterclass taught by Cabin core contributors.

* [Memes of Production: DAOs as Financial Flash Mobs and Hyperstructures](https://creators.mirror.xyz/5YUK1Ef3BEMA9QEZvbOIh7ukbjAYL_0cs_NLplqgHw4) – Cabin cofounder Jon Hillis will host an hourlong fireside chat and Q&A around building communities and DAOs.
* [How to DAO 401: DAO Community Leadership](https://creators.mirror.xyz/BIKmTKdNiMkK1dbtUInS0zoZgVdo18i55Vh3iMU9g_I) – Cabin cofounders Jon and Zakk will host an hourlong tactical masterclass on the growing pains, problems, and solutions so far in building Cabin.
* [How to DAO 201: Onboarding as Wayfinding](https://creators.mirror.xyz/ggSQQlTSGqJ2_U7HVNjm4f3s98on5EfUyR9rW_z3fw0) – Cabin’s Community Guild stewards Jackson Steger, Jon Dean, and Chalice Stroebe will walk participants through how they built and maintained Cabin’s onboarding systems. They’ll take participants behind the scenes into our welcome calls, onboarding flow, and documentation.

Before we get into how you can mint, you might be wondering ...

## Why is Cabin doing this?

Early this year, we outlined [a vision for our Media Guild](https://creators.mirror.xyz/qJH0ctOb1IJzcnqbMeMKIPE-9qgUk-kkIEV353eqgxw) saying,

> *The Media Guild is a way for \[contributors\] to build careers in web3 and earn equity in the form of ₡ABIN tokens. Moving forward, we’ll continue to experiment with various compensation structures such as minting articles as NFTs (with 100% proceeds going to the writers) and paying writers in ETH or USDC ...  This allows a writer to earn true passive income, in addition to the fixed rate for each article.*

We want to offer our contributors liquidity, apart from selling ₡ABIN. Currently, most of our contributors are compensated in ₡ABIN. Minting articles as NFTs and creating utility for them [allows writers to receive more liquid and less volatile compensation for their work](https://twitter.com/rafathebuilder/status/1477645365902032898?s=20&t=czK5JltECA1tFeZVeBDgtQ).

In the vision article mentioned above we wrote,

> *How we monetize our content and finance the guild matters. Sure, we can put ads in our newsletter, but that would be perpetuating a system with misaligned  — albeit profitable — incentives. We’re not against putting ads in our work, but we want to prioritize experimentation with web3-native business models that can only happen because of web3.*

This is an experiment that will allow us to attract and reward higher quality contributors and contributions than ever before.

Top-class but skeptical professional writers and journalists might be persuaded to dip their toes into web3, crypto, and DAOs and write for Cabin.

Our current contributors will want to put out the best ideas and pieces of content they can and as a result, will want editing and feedback. They will want to hone their craft as longform online writers and Twitter thread writers because this directly correlates with how much the piece gets shared and as a result, how much they could potentially earn from a piece.

Writers will be  able to earn passive income in ETH, in addition to membership in a community through ₡ABIN. This model will make  quality content creation becomes a very lucrative and rewarding incentive.

*And what’s in it for minters and supporters of the cause?*

* DAO operators who are building or would like to build DAOs and other web3 communities get training and their questions answered from one of the foremost social DAOs in web3 in terms of operational excellence.
* VCs, DAO-curious, and other tech folks from web2 to get a behind-the-scenes look into how DAOs operate and what the next iteration of work will look like.
* Curators and DAO thought leaders can support their favorite writers and own a piece of their work. (If you're sharing an article all over the place, then you might as well brag about your fandom and get rewarded for it, right?)

## How do I mint?

We’ll cover the exact instructions but first, there are two tiers available to mint:

title: Mint Cabin’s Writing NFTs: Access Masterclasses, Support Our Contributors & Cast Your Vote for the Future of Work in Web3
body:
🎉 To celebrate Cabin’s first birthday, we’re proud to announce that we partnered with Mirror to publish three of our most popular articles as NFTs.

Mirror’s crowdfunding platform powered Cabin initial crowdfund. Since then, it’s been our home to build the DAO in public. Today, we’re taking that partnership to the next level.

**From now until the end of May, members, fans, and lurkers of the Cabin community have the unique opportunity to [collect](https://g.mirror.xyz/rq__HuWEfylTTjaYeMMkheYvCEV3obxuW09STRjLqG4) and mint three of our most popular articles as [Writing NFTs](https://dev.mirror.xyz/5gt60vKFJZ_tR1BjoJ7-Y0sNw7REebStHjzFU5x73J0) and directly support the Cabin contributors behind each article.** Here’s the exciting part: Every NFT minted is a ticket to an intimate masterclass taught by Cabin core contributors.

* [Memes of Production: DAOs as Financial Flash Mobs and Hyperstructures](https://creators.mirror.xyz/5YUK1Ef3BEMA9QEZvbOIh7ukbjAYL_0cs_NLplqgHw4) – Cabin cofounder Jon Hillis will host an hourlong fireside chat and Q&A around building communities and DAOs.
* [How to DAO 401: DAO Community Leadership](https://creators.mirror.xyz/BIKmTKdNiMkK1dbtUInS0zoZgVdo18i55Vh3iMU9g_I) – Cabin cofounders Jon and Zakk will host an hourlong tactical masterclass on the growing pains, problems, and solutions so far in building Cabin.
* [How to DAO 201: Onboarding as Wayfinding](https://creators.mirror.xyz/ggSQQlTSGqJ2_U7HVNjm4f3s98on5EfUyR9rW_z3fw0) – Cabin’s Community Guild stewards Jackson Steger, Jon Dean, and Chalice Stroebe will walk participants through how they built and maintained Cabin’s onboarding systems. They’ll take participants behind the scenes into our welcome calls, onboarding flow, and documentation.

Before we get into how you can mint, you might be wondering ...

## Why is Cabin doing this?

Early this year, we outlined [a vision for our Media Guild](https://creators.mirror.xyz/qJH0ctOb1IJzcnqbMeMKIPE-9qgUk-kkIEV353eqgxw) saying,

> *The Media Guild is a way for \[contributors\] to build careers in web3 and earn equity in the form of ₡ABIN tokens. Moving forward, we’ll continue to experiment with various compensation structures such as minting articles as NFTs (with 100% proceeds going to the writers) and paying writers in ETH or USDC ...  This allows a writer to earn true passive income, in addition to the fixed rate for each article.*

We want to offer our contributors liquidity, apart from selling ₡ABIN. Currently, most of our contributors are compensated in ₡ABIN. Minting articles as NFTs and creating utility for them [allows writers to receive more liquid and less volatile compensation for their work](https://twitter.com/rafathebuilder/status/1477645365902032898?s=20&t=czK5JltECA1tFeZVeBDgtQ).

In the vision article mentioned above we wrote,

> *How we monetize our content and finance the guild matters. Sure, we can put ads in our newsletter, but that would be perpetuating a system with misaligned  — albeit profitable — incentives. We’re not against putting ads in our work, but we want to prioritize experimentation with web3-native business models that can only happen because of web3.*

This is an experiment that will allow us to attract and reward higher quality contributors and contributions than ever before.

Top-class but skeptical professional writers and journalists might be persuaded to dip their toes into web3, crypto, and DAOs and write for Cabin.

Our current contributors will want to put out the best ideas and pieces of content they can and as a result, will want editing and feedback. They will want to hone their craft as longform online writers and Twitter thread writers because this directly correlates with how much the piece gets shared and as a result, how much they could potentially earn from a piece.

Writers will be  able to earn passive income in ETH, in addition to membership in a community through ₡ABIN. This model will make  quality content creation becomes a very lucrative and rewarding incentive.

*And what’s in it for minters and supporters of the cause?*

* DAO operators who are building or would like to build DAOs and other web3 communities get training and their questions answered from one of the foremost social DAOs in web3 in terms of operational excellence.
* VCs, DAO-curious, and other tech folks from web2 to get a behind-the-scenes look into how DAOs operate and what the next iteration of work will look like.
* Curators and DAO thought leaders can support their favorite writers and own a piece of their work. (If you're sharing an article all over the place, then you might as well brag about your fandom and get rewarded for it, right?)

title: O que são NFTs?
body:
## Definição

A tecnologia dos NFTs, **Non-Fungible Tokens**, foi creada em 2017 através de contratos inteligentes na blockchain Ethereum. No início de 2021, os NFTs entram de repente em destaque no mundo das criptomoedas e tecnologia subjacente (blockchain).

Um NFT é um tipo de token. **Mas o que são tokens?**

**Tokens** são unidades virtuais que confirmam a posse de certo activo digital. Os tokens operam com base na tecnologia blockchain, aquela que está na base das criptomoedas. Para entender melhor os conceitos **blockchain** e **criptomoeda**, recomendo a leitura deste artigo:

[https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ](https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ)

Entre todos os tokens existentes (mais de 13 000 neste momento - o site [Coingecko](https://www.coingecko.com/) chama-os todos de ‘Coins’, mas na realidade só alguns são moedas) há alguns que se chamam moedas. Uma moeda, ou criptomoeda, é semelhante a uma moeda física, e é um token nativo de certa blockchain. Cada blockchain só tem uma moeda, mas pode ter vários tokens. As moedas tipicamente têm o mesmo nome da blockchain onde operam. Por exemplo, [SOLANA](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solana) (SOL) é a moeda da blockchain Solana, e [SOLCIAL](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solcial) (SLCL) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Por exemplo, [ETHEREUM ou ETHER](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum) (ETH) é a moeda da blockchain Ethereum, e [BASIC ATTENTION TOKEN](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/basic-attention-token) (BAT) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Note-se que tokens que não sejam nativos, i.e não sejam moedas, podem existir em várias blockchains, como é o caso do BAT (tal facto está indicado no campo ‘Contract’, menu **…**, em **Info** - ver link acima).

Os portadores de tokens podem, além de os guardar nas suas carteiras digitais, trocá-los por outros tokens em casas de cambio online, vendê-los (NFTs) em *marketplaces*, oferecê-los, ou usá-los para comprar algo. Existem vários tipos de tokens, entre os quais destaco:

* **Pagamento** – usado para efectuar transações financeiras no mundo digital (moedas como Solana, Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum).
* **Utilitário** – usado para dar acesso a produtos ou serviços baseados em alguma blockchain.

  Todos os tipos anteriores são **fungíveis** (*fungible tokens*), ou seja, podem ser trocados por algo de valor igual – 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa A vale o mesmo que 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa B, ou seja, se as pessoas trocarem as moedas o cenário não se altera. Tal não se passa com os NFTs, pois cada um é único. Diz-se por isso que são **não-fungíveis**.
* **NFT** – certificados digitais únicos de trabalhos originais, onde o criador original terá sempre controlo sobre a forma como o trabalho é licensiado. São compostos por vários elementos, tais como:
  * **conteúdo digital** que representa – ficheiro de imagem, audio, texto, ou vídeo.
  * **criador** – identificação do criador do token.
  * **proprietário** – identificação do actual proprietário do token, o qual será ainda o criador se o token não tiver sido oferecido ou vendido.
  * **preço ou ofertas**, caso esteja à venda ou em leilão.
  * **metadados** – informações sobre o activo digital, como assinatura do criador, descrição, tipo de ficheiro, resolução, histórico de transações, data e hora da sua criação, …

Outra diferença entre **NFTs** e tokens fungíveis (como moedas, por exemplo) é a **indivisibilidade** dos primeiros. Por exemplo, poderás enviar 0.05 Bitcoins a um amigo, mas não poderás fazer o mesmo com 5% de um NFT.

## Valor

Se todos os criadores digitais publicarem os seus novos trabalhos, originais, como NFT, todo aquele que tentar copiar o seu trabalho e certificá-lo como NFT, muito dificilmente terá o seu trabalho reconhecido como original. Isto porque existem mecanismos (e cada vez existirão mais) para saber se certo conteúdo digital já foi publicado mais que uma vez na web como NFT (e.g, vários marketplaces fazem essa fiscalização, em breve existirão **motores de busca de NFTs** – ver websites em baixo, e poderás usar o [motor de busca da Google](https://images.google.com/) para saber a localização de certo ficheiro de imagem).

[https://nftsearch.site/](https://nftsearch.site/)

**Nota**: *se ainda não existir na base de dados, deverás/poderás adicionar o NFT que procuras à mesma*.

[https://hebys.io/](https://hebys.io/)

[https://nftlab.com/](https://nftlab.com/)

[https://nooft.io/](https://nooft.io/)

Regra geral, é possível salvar ou copiar o conteúdo digital de um NFT, seja uma imagem, vídeo, áudio ou documento, mas nunca será possível copiar o NFT. Esse terá sempre um único proprietário. Uma pessoa que crie um NFT com base na cópia  (ficheiro, screenshot) do conteúdo digital de outro NFT, terá sempre em sua posse um NFT distinto, publicado em data posterior à do original.

> *Markets for traditional art and collectibles are thriving despite forgeries, and the issue is even smaller with NFTs* ([ref](https://archive.ph/ptRTw))

Os NFTs podem ser programados para permitir ao criador/autor arrecadar dinheiro sempre que o NFT for vendido, normalmente entre 2.5% a 10% do preço de venda.

## Como Criar e Comercializar?

Qualquer pessoa pode criar algo digitalmente, transformá-lo num NFT em alguma blockchain (processo chamado ‘Minting’ em Inglês), e colocar esse token para venda em algum *marketplace* online. Alguns locais cobram para publiar os teus NFTs. Qualquer marketplace cobra uma taxa do valor de venda de cada NFT, a qual poderá ser suportada pelo comprador ou pelo vendedor, dependendo da plataforma.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GGvxJ9xOJMs4wmx6mBN0S.png?height=530&width=1127)

De modo a poderes comprar um NFT, precisarás de dispor na tua carteira digital da criptomoeda associada à blockchain onde o token está alojado.

### Marketplaces

Neste momento, os seguintes 3 mercados permitem-te criar e vender NFTs de forma gratuita:

* Rarible ([ref](https://archive.ph/Qd8Oa))
* Mintable
* [OpenSea](https://opensea.io/)

Mercados que sigo:

title: NFT Reviews #27
body:
Hi, and welcome to issue 27 of NFT Matrix, where I review NFT Artists’ work. There is no presumption or judgement here, only exposure. The artist I am reviewing is **Seerlight**. Dreamy and film-quality is how I would describe their work. I look at a couple of the artist’s pieces from their various platforms and provide my review. Hope you enjoy, I’m always open to feedback.

![Odyssey](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JRiBTy_UhQCrrEHlpTupR.png?height=692&width=1224)

**Piece: “**Odyssey**”**

**[Link](https://opensea.io/assets/0x495f947276749ce646f68ac8c248420045cb7b5e/97869798444724883384927327569229813102508220427212553862986279211047927676929)**

This piece is dream-like and colorful. It makes me wonder what it would be like to ride in an interstellar flying ship.

![Sky Window](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/y509jf1pE-6irtiSn1N8u.png?height=1222&width=870)

**Piece: “**Sky Window**”**

**[Link](https://opensea.io/assets/0x85f16125fadef90aa0b5373fb5b8b870883c60c0/10)**

This piece provides a portal to sunlight in the middle of a calm summer evening. I love the vividness and the colors - each invokes memories of beautiful sunny days and firefly summers.

![Spirited Away](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iXs2eWHPw3rsBOkpeV95M.png?height=1228&width=918)

**Piece: “**Spirited Away**”**

**[Link](https://opensea.io/assets/0x85f16125fadef90aa0b5373fb5b8b870883c60c0/9)**

Another gorgeous, calm, and colorful piece. The dragon contributes to the mystical feeling of the painting.

Well, I hope you enjoyed this brief introduction to the artist! Find their links [here](https://linktr.ee/seerlight).

See you next time!

Feel free to reply, share, or subscribe!

**you can support by bidding on some of my art here:**

[Bid on my collab with Dusty Kessler on Blind Boxes](https://v2.blindboxes.io/collectiondetail/1/5)

or tipping using arbitrum (0x43Ea4015aDA7edCD4605eF2974EC4c4c6629830E).

title: FOAM Trust Zone Program FAQ
body:
The goal of the Trust Zone program is to have select partners run the FOAM protocol in different geographical environments and test different zone configurations. **The selected participant partners will also assemble the current prototype of the Zone Anchor, secure a minimum of four locations for installation, run localization experiments and submit the results for evaluation.**

This is a beta testing program for early qualified stakeholders aligned with the mission of the protocol to contribute to refining and defining needed features. The partner participation process will be to maintain your own Zone with a focus on building a high quality fault tolerant network that will seed the network’s initial growth and security.

Until now, we’ve been running these experiments in a closed network. **We are excited to announce that it is now time to open up this experiment by adding community run Zones!**

[https://mirror.xyz/foamspace.eth/Awq0ItP4fxvg7_HAZA3gNQnNgoE_7Ogj_4n2EkDed-I](https://mirror.xyz/foamspace.eth/Awq0ItP4fxvg7_HAZA3gNQnNgoE_7Ogj_4n2EkDed-I)


---

*Additional information about the Trust Zone Program can be found in the **Brochure Overview** linked below:*

[https://foam.space/publicAssets/FOAM_Trust_Zone_Overview.pdf](https://foam.space/publicAssets/FOAM_Trust_Zone_Overview.pdf)

### What is a Trust zone?

A Trust Zone is a beta radio network run by partner participants to further test and further develop the FOAM Proof of Location protocol. A Trust Zone also serves as a development platform to implement new features and run localization experiments.

A Trust Zone requires a minimum of 4 radios installed with quality line of site visibility to each other. **A Zone maintains a quorum over time and space across their location horizon by upholding accuracy and precision, Trust Zones will play a crucial role in verifying the growth of the network and uphold sovereign and secure location services.** This is infrastructure for the future.

### What kind of locations are qualified and what are the basic requirements?

The goal of the Trust Zone program is to test FOAM technology is as many types of environments as possible. A diverse set of test data will further refine localization performance. Participants in the Trust Zone program are welcome to build their Zones across urban and rural environments.

In addition to line of sight between four Zone Anchors, basic requirements for a Zone regardless of environment type is for each Zone Anchor radio to have access to power and internet backhaul.

### What is the size and distance between Zone Anchors required?

![The Current FOAM test Zone in the Brooklyn Navy Yard has a maximum distance of 1 kilometer between Zone Anchors ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IBdRjbc0QI6HTbEMysTBs.png?height=1672&width=2432)

**An additional goal of the Trust Zone testing program is to further understand this question.** As a radio based system, the performance of the network is impacted by a number of factors such as signal obstruction from buildings. Each Trust Zone will have its own limits on distance and size and  will need to take this into consideration. **The optimal zone configuration for each Trust zone will take some trial and error.**

While the radio’s used in each Zone Anchor can transmit up to multiple miles, within FOAM the localization performance is directly correlated to how consistently each of the four or more nodes receive each others radio packets. The further away Zone Anchors are from each other the higher the chance there will be packet loss, degrading performance of localization. **Participants will contribute in determining a system wide maximum zone as a best practice.**

The Current FOAM test Zone in the Brooklyn Navy Yard has a maximum distance of 1 kilometer between Zone Anchors, in a dense industrial environment, as a starting baseline data point. When building a Zone tests are required before committing to the selected locations. One of the first steps is to run a visibility and packet align test across the Zone Anchors to assess the location's viability. **Partner participants will work with the Foamspace team on assessing the results of these tests before approving a permanent installation of the Zone.**

### Can I build my own hardware?

Yes, initial selected parter participants for the Trust Zone program are highly encouraged to build and assemble their own Zone Anchors. **The Foamspace team will be able to provide key custom components as well as components that may be hard to find due to supply chain challenges.** Participants will have the option to receive pre-assembled hardware on a need be basis.

*The first Zone Anchor product for purchase is currently under development and will be made available in the next phase of the program.*

![FOAM Zone Anchor prototype that can be assembled by participants ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w8dELFUSSc48YmF5iBejh.png?height=1338&width=1932)

### I do not own the buildings I am looking to install Zone Anchors on, or I am setting up a Zone without buildings, what do I need to do?

If you are planning on installing Zone Anchors on buildings that you do not own, you will need to arrange authorization or procure a lease with the building owner. **Each partner participant will have to solve for this based on their circumstances.** In general *Universities are great hosts* for Trust Zones as an agreement is needed with only one entity for multiple buildings.

In areas without tall buildings, such as suburban or rural environments, for good radio visibility, properly secured and legally set up **antenna masts or small scale towers can be used to mount the Zone Anchor** and/or its antennas. Installing such a set up on top of elevated areas such as hills is also a recommended solution

### What types of Antennas will I need?

Currently, **a single Zone Anchor requires two antennas that operate in LoRa frequency band**, with quality signal fidelity driving localization. Example recommendations are the following antennas based on visibility between static nodes and installation topography:

1. Low visibility and/or Urban landscapes: [9 dBi Panel Antenna](https://www.l-com.com/wireless-antenna-900-mhz-9-dbi-heavy-duty-flat-panel-antenna?utm_source=gristleking&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=best+antenna+for+helium), [PulseLarsen 11 dBi Yagi Antenna](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/pulselarsen-antennas/YA5900W/9646435)
2. High variability in elevation between node installations: [RAKWireless 3 dBi Fiberglass Antenna](https://store.rakwireless.com/collections/accessories/products/fiber-glass-antenna?variant=39705894518982)
3. High visibility and open landscapes: [Taoglass 8 dBi Omnidirectional Antenna](https://www.digikey.com/en/products/detail/taoglas-limited/OMB-915-B08F21/8275277)

For example, in a densely packed city, where visibility between the nodes is low, a directional antenna can be used as a Receiving antenna and an omnidirectional antenna can be used a Transmitting antenna.

A 50 ohms LMR 400 coaxial cable, that is rated for outdoor usage, is recommended to connect the antenna to the Zone Anchor: [Linx Technologies RF cable assembly](https://www.mouser.com/ProductDetail/Linx-Technologies/CSO-NM-1200-NM?qs=vmHwEFxEFR91sLC9C6UcaQ%3D%3D)

Based off of the preliminary locations submitted to host your Trust Zone when applying, we will work with you to select and assess antenna type, gain and elevation required for your zone.

### How will I manage and interact with my Trust Zone?

**FOAM has developed a web application called Hostel for managing experiments and viewing results.** Hostel is a suite of tools for: remotely configuring radios and the Zone, executing and monitoring experiments, data pipelines for processing localization data, dashboards for quality assessment and visualizations as well as health monitors for the status of all of the nodes.

![Hostel, Web Application for managing your Trust Zone ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MBBLXc73cjKjnRPXS139_.png?height=758&width=1208)

### How much power is required? Do I need a license? Will this be disruptive to the energy draw and power bill for the building?

The current Zone Anchor prototype is a low power device. It draws a maximum current of 0.9 A and 0.4 A when idle at 12 V, leading to a power requirement of 11 W. You do not need a license to operate this device as it uses unlicensed frequency band for wireless communication. This will not cause disruption to the power consumption of the building. It is equivalent to having a phone charger plugged into a wall socket.

### How much space/ what is the footprint of the installation?

The current Zone Anchor prototype enclosure has the dimensions: 11.750"L X 9.980"W. The wall-mounted installation will span 2 ft by 1 ft. Antenna masts can be attached to this installation.

### What are the technical requirements to participate?

* Basic DIY competency (using hand tools, following instructions)
* Basic technology competence (connecting cables, installing software, etc.)
* Familiarity with the Linux shell preferable, though should be rarely required. (ability to SSH into devices)
* Experience interacting with web3 protocols and or operating blockchain infrastructure preferable
* LTE network subscription with SIM cards

### What is the duration of time Trust Zone program?

**The initial engagement for partner participants working with the existing Zone Anchor prototype will be for 6 months**. The program will further expand to increase the number of participants and features tested and include the initial Zone Anchor product currently under manufacturing development.

### What are FOAM's expectations of a Partner, number of experiments/tests, hours per week?

The time required to set up a Trust Zone will vary by each participants circumstances. The program is broken down into stages, across applying, sourcing locations, assembling hardware and initial tests before installation. We will provide time estimates for these stages with all associated resources and guides.

**Once a Trust Zone is established, operating stable and permanently installed the expectation is that participants are running experiments to localize devices within their zone, contributing to analyzing the results and providing feedback and feature requests.** We estimate a minimum of 5 hours a week will be required to operate, maintain and troubleshoot an established Trust Zone.

We expect participant teams to communicate with us throughout the process, including but not limited to providing qualitative and quantitative feedback about the protocol, products and experience as well as creating content and documenting the program experience.

![Multiple Mounting Options](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/U32cMCs2ZTspQ40lq0aAw.png?height=1672&width=2432)

### What are the benefits to participating in the Trust Zone program?

As a participant in the Trust Zone program you will be eligible for earning FOAM token rewards. The Trust Zone program is designed to attract and align stakeholders that believe Proof of Location is a critical prerequisite for the further development of Web3 use cases, accelerating a world where smart contracts interact with the physical world.

**Participating in the program puts you at the center of FOAMs development and steward new forms of location technology. You will have a key role in shaping the development of the protocol and needed features while helping to refine localization results.**

Trust Zone participants will be in a position to be the first Zone Operators when the network further opens to stake FOAM tokens, earn mining rewards and offer location services to customers.

### I am interested in applying to participate, what are the next steps?

Registration is temporally closed as we process the first batch, sign up for waitlist registration below. We want to hear from you! 

[https://cqnllvd8gl2.typeform.com/to/EKlKIoEe](https://cqnllvd8gl2.typeform.com/to/EKlKIoEe)


---

title: Mint Cabin’s Writing NFTs: Access Masterclasses, Support Our Contributors & Cast Your Vote for the Future of Work in Web3
body:
🎉 To celebrate Cabin’s first birthday, we’re proud to announce that we partnered with Mirror to publish three of our most popular articles as NFTs.

Mirror’s crowdfunding platform powered Cabin initial crowdfund. Since then, it’s been our home to build the DAO in public. Today, we’re taking that partnership to the next level.

**From now until the end of May, members, fans, and lurkers of the Cabin community have the unique opportunity to [collect](https://g.mirror.xyz/rq__HuWEfylTTjaYeMMkheYvCEV3obxuW09STRjLqG4) and mint three of our most popular articles as [Writing NFTs](https://dev.mirror.xyz/5gt60vKFJZ_tR1BjoJ7-Y0sNw7REebStHjzFU5x73J0) and directly support the Cabin contributors behind each article.** Here’s the exciting part: Every NFT minted is a ticket to an intimate masterclass taught by Cabin core contributors.

* [Memes of Production: DAOs as Financial Flash Mobs and Hyperstructures](https://creators.mirror.xyz/5YUK1Ef3BEMA9QEZvbOIh7ukbjAYL_0cs_NLplqgHw4) – Cabin cofounder Jon Hillis will host an hourlong fireside chat and Q&A around building communities and DAOs.
* [How to DAO 401: DAO Community Leadership](https://creators.mirror.xyz/BIKmTKdNiMkK1dbtUInS0zoZgVdo18i55Vh3iMU9g_I) – Cabin cofounders Jon and Zakk will host an hourlong tactical masterclass on the growing pains, problems, and solutions so far in building Cabin.
* [How to DAO 201: Onboarding as Wayfinding](https://creators.mirror.xyz/ggSQQlTSGqJ2_U7HVNjm4f3s98on5EfUyR9rW_z3fw0) – Cabin’s Community Guild stewards Jackson Steger, Jon Dean, and Chalice Stroebe will walk participants through how they built and maintained Cabin’s onboarding systems. They’ll take participants behind the scenes into our welcome calls, onboarding flow, and documentation.

*Who is this for? What’s in it for minters and supporters of the cause?*

* **DAO operators** who are building or would like to build DAOs and other web3 communities can get their questions answered and thorniest problems solved, by one of the operationally sound social DAOs in web3.
* **VCs, DAO-curious, and other tech folks from web2** get a behind-the-scenes look into how DAOs operate and what the next iteration of work will look like.
* **Curators and DAO thought leaders** can support their favorite writers and own a piece of their work. (If you're sharing an article all over the place, then you might as well brag about your fandom and get rewarded for it, right?)

Before we get into how you can mint, you might be wondering ...

## Why is Cabin doing this?

Early this year, we outlined [a vision for our Media Guild](https://creators.mirror.xyz/qJH0ctOb1IJzcnqbMeMKIPE-9qgUk-kkIEV353eqgxw) saying,

> *The Media Guild is a way for \[contributors\] to build careers in web3 and earn equity in the form of ₡ABIN tokens. Moving forward, we’ll continue to experiment with various compensation structures such as minting articles as NFTs (with 100% proceeds going to the writers) and paying writers in ETH or USDC ...  This allows a writer to earn true passive income, in addition to the fixed rate for each article.*

We want to offer our contributors liquidity, apart from selling ₡ABIN. Currently, most of our contributors are compensated in ₡ABIN. Minting articles as NFTs and creating utility for them [allows writers to receive more liquid and less volatile compensation for their work](https://twitter.com/rafathebuilder/status/1477645365902032898?s=20&t=czK5JltECA1tFeZVeBDgtQ).

In the vision article mentioned above we wrote,

> *How we monetize our content and finance the guild matters. Sure, we can put ads in our newsletter, but that would be perpetuating a system with misaligned  — albeit profitable — incentives. We’re not against putting ads in our work, but we want to prioritize experimentation with web3-native business models that can only happen because of web3.*

Writers will be  able to earn passive income in ETH, in addition to membership in a community through ₡ABIN. This model will make  quality content creation becomes a very lucrative and rewarding incentive.

**Top-class but skeptical professional writers and journalists** might be persuaded to dip their toes into web3, crypto, and DAOs and write for Cabin.

**Our current contributors** will want to put out the best ideas and pieces of content they can and as a result, will want editing and feedback. They will want to hone their craft as longform online writers and Twitter thread writers because this directly correlates with how much the piece gets shared and as a result, how much they could potentially earn from a piece.

This is an experiment that will allow us to attract and reward higher quality contributors and contributions than ever before.

## How do I mint?

We’ll cover the exact instructions but first, there are two tiers available to mint:

### Tier 1: Collect the 5/5 NFT Edition

Mint the NFTs below. This reserves you a live spot in the online workshop for that topic. You’ll also get a recording and additional resources from the workshop.

* Each post can be minted for the ETH equivalent of $200 with a gas cost of \~$0.50
* Each post will have a supply of 5
* 100% of funds go directly to the authors who wrote the article and the artists who designed the art
* Make sure to [fill out this form](https://creatorcabins.ck.page/1e097dd41d) afterwards so we can get your email and contact you about the workshops!


* [Memes of Production: DAOs as Financial Flash Mobs and Hyperstructures](https://creators.mirror.xyz/5YUK1Ef3BEMA9QEZvbOIh7ukbjAYL_0cs_NLplqgHw4) – Cabin cofounder Jon Hillis will host an hourlong fireside chat and Q&A around building communities and DAOs.
* [How to DAO 401: DAO Community Leadership](https://creators.mirror.xyz/BIKmTKdNiMkK1dbtUInS0zoZgVdo18i55Vh3iMU9g_I) – Cabin cofounders Jon and Zakk will host an hourlong tactical masterclass on the growing pains, problems, and solutions so far in building Cabin.

*An hourlong masterclass on how Cabin’s Community Guild built and maintained Cabin’s onboarding systems. We’ll take participants behind the scenes into our welcome calls, onboarding flow, and documentation.*

---

*Join Cabin cofounders Jon and Zakk for an intimate, tactical masterclass on the growing pains, problems, and solutions in building a vibey web3 community.*


---

*Join Cabin cofounder Jon Hillis for a small group, fireside chat and Q&A around dispersing narratives and building mimetic communities.*

[edition://0x976d3A145054D0036c0F28f67c1f1f28C94aC532?editionId=0](edition://0x976d3A145054D0036c0F28f67c1f1f28C94aC532?editionId=0)

### Tier 2: Collect the 100/100 Writing NFT

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UYaZm5UwLfxpO0atcZiqA.png?height=942&width=1263)

Go to the articles below, click “Collect”, and follow the instructions afterwards:

* [Memes of Production: DAOs as Financial Flash Mobs and Hyperstructures](https://creators.mirror.xyz/5YUK1Ef3BEMA9QEZvbOIh7ukbjAYL_0cs_NLplqgHw4)
* [How to DAO 401: DAO Community Leadership](https://creators.mirror.xyz/BIKmTKdNiMkK1dbtUInS0zoZgVdo18i55Vh3iMU9g_I)
* [How to DAO 201: Onboarding as Wayfinding](https://creators.mirror.xyz/ggSQQlTSGqJ2_U7HVNjm4f3s98on5EfUyR9rW_z3fw0)

This allows you to showcase the article in your collection. While we’ve reserved live workshop spots for 5/5 NFT minters, minting the 100/100 means you get a recording and additional resources after the workshop ends.

* Each post can be minted for the ETH equivalent of $5 with a gas cost of \~$0.50
* Each post will have a supply of 100
* 100% of funds go directly to the contributors of the article
* Make sure to [fill out this form](https://creatorcabins.ck.page/1e097dd41d) afterwards so we can get your email and contact you about the workshop recordings!

### Tl;DR How to mint NFTs & get access to workshops

1. Mint the 100/100 Writing NFT or the 5/5 NFT Edition following Mirror’s instructions. You can mint the Writing NFT from each article’s site. You can mint the 5/5 NFT Edition at the end of this section..
2. [Fill out this form](https://creatorcabins.ck.page/1e097dd41d) with your email address, the wallet address you used to mint, and the article/s you minted. (This allows us to send you the link for the workshops)
3. Check your inbox and confirm your subscription.
4. Sit tight! If you minted ...
   * The 5/5 NFT Edition, we’ll get in touch via email to coordinate the details of the online workshop for sometime in June ‘22.
   * The 100/100 Writing NFT, we’ll keep you in the loop and send you the recording and resources after the workshop happens.

## What’s next?

This is a way for web3 enthusiasts and optimists to invest in the future of the ecosystem, namely in a future with NFT utility and contributor liquidity. Cabin is using this as a test to divorce token speculation from IRL financial liquidity of its contributors. This is also a way to incentivize contributors and bounty hunters to hodl their token, instead of selling it. We're doing everything we can to allow committed community members to tangibly demonstrate their long-term commitment to Cabin's community and vision.

title: NBATopShot新人攻略
body:
## NBA TOP SHOT是什么？

NBA Top Shot 是一个基于区块链的平台，允许球迷购买、出售和交易特定的、官方许可的视频集锦的编号版本。NBA 剪出精彩片段，然后 Dapper Labs 决定他们要出售的每个精彩片段的数量和编号。他们将精彩片段放入数字包中，就像常规交易卡一样，并在官方 NBA Top Shot 网站上以不同的价格出售这些包。礼包价格取决于精彩片段的质量、明星水平和卡的属性。简单地说，NBA TOP SHOT可以理解为一种NFT（[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-fungible_token](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-fungible_token)），是电子球星卡。

介绍一下NBA TOP SHOT的项目背景。它的背后团队是Dapper Labs，这个团队在17年开发出了非常火爆的加密猫(cryptokitties)项目，也是最早的区块链游戏，而且很多巨星都投资过Dapper Labs，比如乔丹和杜兰特。同时杜兰特、魔术师约翰逊等都曾正式宣布使用NBATopShot发售他们个人的NFT。另外，TOP SHOT基于的区块链是flow，Flow 是一个快速的、分散的、对开发者友好的区块链，大家感兴趣可以直接看他们的官网[https://www.onflow.org/](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//www.onflow.org/)。

最近在twitter上看到一个调查，78%的活跃的NFT购买者是通过NBA TOP SHOT入圈的，可见NBA TOP SHOT的影响力有多大。

![调查显示78%的NFT玩家通过NBATopShot进入NFT领域](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-80e26f106ff24708bdfb608e8eb3ca46_b.jpg)

## 为了玩NBA TOP SHOT你需要准备什么？

### 梯子

目前NBA TOP SHOT会ban中国区的IP，所以你需要有一个梯子，而且在使用梯子的时候需要开**全局模式**。

### 数字货币or国外的信用卡

因为是基于区块链的游戏，所以使用数字货币是最方便的，信用卡会有比较高的手续费。大家要买卖数字货币需要到交易所，目前比较知名的交易所有币安，OkEx，Huobi等等。

## NBA TOP SHOT有哪些玩法？

接下来进入正题：NBA TOP SHOT有哪些玩法？首先我们在浏览器打开NBA TOP SHOT的页面。

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-01e26a94df4897de1dde7bd84062f3c9_b.jpg)

可以看到顶部的导航栏的几个板块。

### PACKS

TOP SHOT最有意思的地方应该就是PACK DROP了，项目方会定期发售一些包，一般来说每个包中会有几个moment，包和moment都有不同的级别。

目前包有三个级别：

* common:这种包属于很普通的包，价格一般也比较便宜，正常的一般都是9美刀，也有14美刀的时候，比如今年的季后赛包。包中含有三个common moment。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-6f66f86044029efa5752ce1098bd2296_b.jpg)

* rare:这种包相对稀有一些，价格相对也会高一些，早期的价格一般在20多刀，近期很多也都到99刀了。包中只有一个rare moment和若干个common moment。
* legendary:这种包是最稀有的，也是最贵的，最近的总决赛的legendary包价格是799刀，之前的也有999刀的pack，当然也有200多刀的比较便宜的包。这种pack里有一个legendary moment、rare moment(数量不确定，视包而定)和common moment（数量不确定，视包而定）。

这个网址[https://blog.nbatopshot.com/category/drops](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//blog.nbatopshot.com/category/drops)有历来发的包的明细，可以看一下。

介绍完了包的分类，我们紧接着说一下moment的分类，TOP SHOT有透露moment总共是有五种级别，但是目前发售的只有四种，在Pack的级别的基础上加了一种fandom级别。

* common:最普通的moment，common pack中开出的都是这种moment，这种moment的发行量比较大，一般从1000-40000个不等。面前来看，早期发售的common moment一般都是几千个左右，而现在的common moment很多都已经到了10000多，甚至40000的数量。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-386f9835f736f59c5f94822e8f31cb53_b.jpg)

* fandom:这个是最近刚推出没多久的一种级别，具体可以看这篇博客[https://blog.nbatopshot.com/posts/fandom-tier](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//blog.nbatopshot.com/posts/fandom-tier)，简单地说fandom是介于common和rare之间的，而且它的数量并不是确定的，而是根据大家对这个moment的需求来决定它的数量，具体方式讲到挑战部分会更清楚一些。这种包的获取方式目前来看有两种，一个是通过做挑战赢得奖励来获得，另外就是买common pack来获得，比如最近的WNBA的pack drop里很多都是fandom级别。下面是当前市场上所有的fandom级别的moment,可以看出fandom的数量和common其实差别不大，多的会接近30000个，少的只有1000多个。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-fa457454f8ac1e7054b47e8371a22dab_b.jpg)

* rare:稀有的moment,这种moment在rare pack开出来。这种moment的数量一般在299-2021个之间。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-ad89b52006f584b666745504a4cb8e33_b.jpg)

* legendary:目前为止最稀有的moment，这种moment在legendary pack中开出来。数量在25-120个之间。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-d4dba6379a0353d27560a29831512bb2_b.jpg)

* ultimate:这种级别的moment是最稀有的，但是目前没有发行。

### MARKETPLACE

顾名思义，这里就是二级市场，包中开出来的moment可以在挂单交易，你也可以在这里买别人挂出的moment。市场支持通过不同的条件筛选，如下所示。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-90327bb1a1a4cc929782d770b29c2e0e_b.jpg)

### COMMUNITY

这里支持搜索所有的TOP SHOT的用户，可以看到他们的收藏。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-35dc6b7234e2a361ec7bae3d597a00fa_b.jpg)

另外，这里还有BLOG的入口，官方的一些文章在这里都可以找到。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-dc11e2c3048de8598380e41098b0ec22_b.jpg)

### COLLECTIONS

这里就是你自己的收藏部分，你可以看你自己拥有的moment。

### CHALLENGES

顾名思义，挑战就是你完成了一些任务之后官方会送一些奖励，分为两部分：challenges和showcase challenges。其实两者的区别不大，玩法都是按照要求集齐一些moment，然后到时候官方就会给你发奖励，只不过showcase challenge会要求你把那些要求的moments放到一个showcase里面，这里的showcase就类似于橱窗展示一样。比如最近showcase challenge就是要求收集五张WNBA的moment，然后做成一个showcase，保留到截至时间之后官方就会送你一个奖励moment。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-318ffdc7c4d170eb979e1aae9bcd2b37_b.jpg)

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-3f8c4f56cb77967cf2cd11db8a0a77ef_b.jpg)

## 购买流程

下面进入正题，给大家讲讲如何购买pack和在marketplace上购买moment。

### 如何入金？

按照如下流程走：

进入网页，鼠标指向右上角小人，然后点击MY DAPPER WALLET。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-3bf7c1914eb8f01294d5deaac9e3bf42_b.jpg)

之后出现如下界面，然后点击下面的add fund to your balance。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-37c57e04fc4580b1b03a241f10281c94_b.jpg)

然后出现如下界面。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-85cbef104bc059f345679f5bba4697c0_b.jpg)

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-7895da1b7e3005300f99cc08e5affb51_b.jpg)

可以看出信用卡需要5-7%的交易费，所以建议还是使用加密货币。

点击pay with crypto之后会弹出如下窗口。

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-4891d45f16a8a4f4fc1b3414517a51d1_b.jpg)

可以看出是通过coinbase交易所充值的，而且注意看Warning，通过BSC和HECO网络充值是到不了的，我自己选ERC-20是可以到账的。

然后点击之后出现如下界面，然后选择自己喜欢的币种点击。我这里选择的是USDC，然后向那个地址转账就好了。可以使用Metamask的Chrome插件转账，也可以直接从交易所提现，目前来看提USDC的话手续费最低的是Huobi，手续费是2刀。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-7a1fa86ea03ebab2603e4d8497800898_b.jpg)

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-15ebf60406db309e43091d9c918d1580_b.jpg)

转账成功之后，余额就可以看到了。

### 购买pack

经过以上入金的步骤，我们就可以购买pack了。点击导航栏的Packs。可以看到有一个starter pack和booster pack。对于每一个新注册的用户，官方都提供了一个starter pack（最近我发现这个包可以买两次，即一下子买两个这样的包）。另外的Booster pack一般是你买了starter pack之后，网站会让你选择一个你的主队（你喜欢的球队），然后如果你在市场上买了3个该球队相关的moment之后你就符合要求，可以买一个booster pack。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-ba19521bf89c170a3699a21fd3845624_b.jpg)

下面一之前买的包为例，给大家展示一下买包的过程。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-b7d87e9455638d1a038c14dc24d6e892_b.jpg)

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-9fc9ea921b7510ea4f412cf84a2753a0_b.jpg)

点击buy now之后就会弹出如下界面。

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-fcd2d7cb208379e2ebe63e6a52e7a14d_b.jpg)

我们可以看到有三种方式可以买包，如果你上一步执行入金，你就可以使用你的Dapper Wallet的余额购买。或者另一种方式是使用Flow(flow区块链的代币，目前在各大交易所都可以交易)，如果使用flow的话，需要连接flow的钱包，目前支持的钱包有Ledger和Blocto，我自己使用的是Blocto（不知道如何下载或者如何从交易所向钱包转账的可以私戳我），以下是假设你已经在钱包存入足够的flow。

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-cc7e0850f898e06deb6238dbf52523bd_b.jpg)

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-627abd82b94e2c3a7e1260fd2ce8c26f_b.jpg)

然后会要求填写你Blocto钱包的账户，填写之后会出现如下界面。

![](https://pic2.zhimg.com/v2-8a65f7f0cb63bcc88f47ce15018859d9_b.jpg)

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b016bb8ab4d2c3e1f20893ad9b6fd23c_b.jpg)

然后点击Confirm之后还会弹出一些界面如下。这里其实就是一些智能合约，点击Approval之后就可以了。

![](https://pic4.zhimg.com/v2-9876d84663a51ada528c0898d8fd1d3f_b.jpg)

之后就支付完成了。

接着上面说买包的第三种方式，就是和之前入金一样的方式，这里就不赘述了。

以上任意三种方式完成之后，就会看到这样的界面。这就代表你已经买包成功了！赶紧开包享受一下吧！当然，也可以点击右上角的Open it later,这样就会存到Collection中的My packs,可以之后再打开。

### 购买moment

我们可以在市场上购买moment，由于不同的moment有不同的编号，所以相同的moment由于不同的编号在市场上挂单的价格也不同，一般来说序号越靠前价格越高，以及和球员的球衣号码相同的价格也比较高。

搜索自己想要的球员或者球队，然后点进去，点击select and buy。

![img](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-b2bad21f2b58d34180668e4b5d2b90e8_b.jpg)

然后点击BUY。

![](https://pic3.zhimg.com/v2-2ad2491dee5bf29da5e8f9b76fdbc2a6_b.jpg)

之后会跳到付款界面。可以看到，目前只支持信用卡和余额支付，信用卡有手续费。

![](https://pic1.zhimg.com/v2-09a659acc68451602ac84707407a2b3c_b.jpg)

付款之后过一会就会到自己的collection中看到了。

## 常用的网站

有几个常用的分析交易数据的网站，给大家推荐一下。

第一个是Momentranks,我个人比较喜欢用，功能比较齐全。基本的市场分析、momentrack都有。

[https://momentranks.com/topshot](https://momentranks.com/topshot)

第二个evalute.market我用的不多，但是功能还是比较全的。

[evaluate.marketevaluate.market/topshot/collections/analyze](https://link.zhihu.com/?target=https%3A//evaluate.market/topshot/collections/analyze)

另外我专门写了一篇关于NBATopShot数据分析网站的文章，欢迎大家阅读。

[https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/473117091](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/473117091)

## 总结

在经济文献中，物品往往存在两大价值阵营：**功能价值和享受价值**，即“我能用这个东西做什么”以及“我有多喜欢这个东西”。自从TOP SHOT出来之后这两种价值也一直伴随着它，对于很多人来说，功能价值可能更重要一些，因为很多moment是有巨大的升值空间的，尤其在早期的时候。前几天詹姆斯的一个Moment卖出了23万美刀的历史最高价。但是我相信对于绝大部分人来说，真正吸引他们的是享受价值，举个例子，如果你是一个杜兰特的球迷，想一下拥有一个今年东部半决赛最后杜兰特踩线两分的moment是一件多么幸福的事。

另外，我们可以发现NBA TOP SHOT团队是在有认真做事的，比如休赛季的几个动作:在拉斯维加斯的夏季联赛现场买包，以及最近刚和WNBA合作推出WNBA包。以及，我们可以打开脑洞畅想一下未来的一些场景：

* 如果NBA TOP SHOT发行了乔丹最后一投，詹姆斯"The Block"以及科比的最后一战的moment会是怎样的场景?TOP SHOT中已经有run it back系列的包，里面不乏很多经典的时刻：比如诺维茨基面对安东尼的绝杀球，乔治在步行者期间的360大风车。
* 如果TOP SHOT不禁大陆的IP，大陆这么多球迷进场又会是什么样子？
* 再开一下脑洞，如果TOP SHOT和NBA 2K合作，推出paly2earn的模式，通过打游戏来获取卡牌，完善经济激励机制，又会是什么样子？

最近的NFT 大火，充满了投机情绪，而TOP SHOT则相对平静，我想一个主要原因是TOP SHOT做到现在发行量已经比较大了，很难投机。但是我们想想NFT这一波过了之后有多少项目会是一地鸡毛？一个项目真正要做成是要靠天时地利和人和，需要项目方持续地改善体验，我认为TOP SHOT的团队是在认真做事，所以，希望TOP SHOT越来越好，大家也越来越喜欢这个游戏。

By Zelig H.SPORT

title: A New Free World — Part 1: What is Humanity Unchained DAO?
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wp2WdgkTiZf4evowW4M8n.png?height=990&width=1400)

[Web3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web3) technologies are allowing humanity to cooperate in ways never seen before in history. An example is [Humanity Unchained DAO ](https://humanityunchained.org/)(or *HUD*, for short), a [Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decentralized_autonomous_organization) running a [semi-direct democracy](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Semi-direct_democracy) algorithm on the blockchain through which the citizens of the DAO can, either through a direct or through a delegated vote, collectively interact with any smart contract. The two key features that make this DAO especial are:

1. Members of the DAO are humans and unique, guarantying the *1-person-1-vote* principle. This is done through [Proof of Humanity](https://proofofhumanity.id/), a system that creates a [sybil-proof](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sybil_attack) [list](https://app.proofofhumanity.id/) of human identities connected to their Ethereum addresses through a combination of webs of trust, with reverse Turing tests, and dispute resolution.
2. The DAO owns a reserve of its native token, the HUD token, of which the DAO is sovereign, and thus it posses ability to implement justice enforcement mechanisms such as locking or forcibly transfer tokens if the DAO collectively decides so.

HUD allows potentially millions of people to, democratically and without restrictions, control every governance decision in the system and how to fund it, such as where and for what purpose funds are allocated, who to trust those funds, or enforce justice by locking or seizing funds. Furthermore, the rules under which the system operates can be modified by the community itself, if they collectively approve to do so. These rules are programmed on a smart contract code, therefore there is no trusted middle-man or intermediaries, and so all transactions are transparent and tamper-proof.

Democratic DAOs (DDAO) like HUD are powerful tools that may open a whole new world of opportunities for social entrepreneurs to solve many of the problems that humanity has suffered since its inception. The current (now deprecated) governance systems are centralized, opaque, rigid and, let’s admit it, designed to preserve the a global cartel of authoritarian parasitic elites and their servants. Because of that, they are highly optimized corruption and repression facilitators. In contrast, HUD is transparent, upgradeable and ideology-free. HUD optimizes the potential for humanity to cooperate by reducing friction and maximizing decentralization. HUD is, in essence, **a tool for human syndication at global scale**.

We envision a future in which the world is no longer governed (or, rather, slaved) as it is today, but a world in which DDAOs like HUD have become widespread all over the world, creating **a market of governance systems in which humans, freely and peacefully, can choose the system they want to live in according to their personal preferences**. We call this world the *New Free World (NFW)*. We aim to use HUD as a fundamental tool to build the foundations of this New Free World.

We live in highly disruptive times and the potential of HUD to transform the way the world is run cannot be ignored. In the following posts, we will explain in more detail why the New Free World is needed, what problems it solves, and how to transition from the current system to the NFW using HUD and other tools and ideas.

title: O que são NFTs?
body:
## Definição

A tecnologia dos NFTs, **Non-Fungible Tokens**, foi creada em 2017 através de contratos inteligentes na blockchain Ethereum. No início de 2021, os NFTs entram de repente em destaque no mundo das criptomoedas e tecnologia subjacente (blockchain).

Um NFT é um tipo de token. **Mas o que são tokens?**

**Tokens** são unidades virtuais que confirmam a posse de certo activo digital. Os tokens operam com base na tecnologia blockchain, aquela que está na base das criptomoedas. Para entender melhor os conceitos **blockchain** e **criptomoeda**, recomendo a leitura deste artigo:

[https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ](https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ)

Entre todos os tokens existentes (mais de 13 000 neste momento - o site [Coingecko](https://www.coingecko.com/) chama-os todos de ‘Coins’, mas na realidade só alguns são moedas) há alguns que se chamam moedas. Uma moeda, ou criptomoeda, é semelhante a uma moeda física, e é um token nativo de certa blockchain. Cada blockchain só tem uma moeda, mas pode ter vários tokens. As moedas tipicamente têm o mesmo nome da blockchain onde operam. Por exemplo, [SOLANA](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solana) (SOL) é a moeda da blockchain Solana, e [SOLCIAL](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solcial) (SLCL) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Por exemplo, [ETHEREUM ou ETHER](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum) (ETH) é a moeda da blockchain Ethereum, e [BASIC ATTENTION TOKEN](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/basic-attention-token) (BAT) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Note-se que tokens que não sejam nativos, i.e não sejam moedas, podem existir em várias blockchains, como é o caso do BAT (tal facto está indicado no campo ‘Contract’, menu **…**, em **Info** - ver link acima).

Os portadores de tokens podem, além de os guardar nas suas carteiras digitais, trocá-los por outros tokens em casas de cambio online, vendê-los (NFTs) em *marketplaces*, oferecê-los, ou usá-los para comprar algo. Existem vários tipos de tokens, entre os quais destaco:

* **Pagamento** – usado para efectuar transações financeiras no mundo digital (moedas como Solana, Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum).
* **Utilitário** – usado para dar acesso a produtos ou serviços baseados em alguma blockchain.

  Todos os tipos anteriores são **fungíveis** (*fungible tokens*), ou seja, podem ser trocados por algo de valor igual – 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa A vale o mesmo que 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa B, ou seja, se as pessoas trocarem as moedas o cenário não se altera. Tal não se passa com os NFTs, pois cada um é único. Diz-se por isso que são **não-fungíveis**.
* **NFT** – certificados digitais únicos de trabalhos originais, onde o criador original terá sempre controlo sobre a forma como o trabalho é licensiado. São compostos por vários elementos, tais como:
  * **conteúdo digital** que representa – ficheiro de imagem, audio, texto, ou vídeo.
  * **criador** – identificação do criador do token.
  * **proprietário** – identificação do actual proprietário do token, o qual será ainda o criador se o token não tiver sido oferecido ou vendido.
  * **preço ou ofertas**, caso esteja à venda ou em leilão.
  * **metadados** – informações sobre o activo digital, como assinatura do criador, descrição, tipo de ficheiro, resolução, histórico de transações, data e hora da sua criação, …

Outra diferença entre **NFTs** e tokens fungíveis (como moedas, por exemplo) é a **indivisibilidade** dos primeiros. Por exemplo, poderás enviar 0.05 Bitcoins a um amigo, mas não poderás fazer o mesmo com 5% de um NFT.

## Valor

Se todos os criadores digitais publicarem os seus novos trabalhos, originais, como NFT, todo aquele que tentar copiar o seu trabalho e certificá-lo como NFT, muito dificilmente terá o seu trabalho reconhecido como original. Isto porque existem mecanismos (e cada vez existirão mais) para saber se certo conteúdo digital já foi publicado mais que uma vez na web como NFT (e.g, vários marketplaces fazem essa fiscalização, em breve existirão **motores de busca de NFTs** – ver websites em baixo, e poderás usar o [motor de busca da Google](https://images.google.com/) para saber a localização de certo ficheiro de imagem).

[https://nftsearch.site/](https://nftsearch.site/)

**Nota**: *se ainda não existir na base de dados, deverás/poderás adicionar o NFT que procuras à mesma*.

[https://hebys.io/](https://hebys.io/)

[https://nftlab.com/](https://nftlab.com/)

[https://nooft.io/](https://nooft.io/)

Regra geral, é possível salvar ou copiar o conteúdo digital de um NFT, seja uma imagem, vídeo, áudio ou documento, mas nunca será possível copiar o NFT. Esse terá sempre um único proprietário. Uma pessoa que crie um NFT com base na cópia  (ficheiro, screenshot) do conteúdo digital de outro NFT, terá sempre em sua posse um NFT distinto, publicado em data posterior à do original.

> *Markets for traditional art and collectibles are thriving despite forgeries, and the issue is even smaller with NFTs* ([ref](https://archive.ph/ptRTw))

Os NFTs podem ser programados para permitir ao criador/autor arrecadar dinheiro sempre que o NFT for vendido, normalmente entre 2.5% a 10% do preço de venda.

## Como Criar e Comercializar?

Qualquer pessoa pode criar algo digitalmente, transformá-lo num NFT em alguma blockchain (processo chamado ‘Minting’ em Inglês), e colocar esse token para venda em algum *marketplace* online. Alguns locais cobram para publiar os teus NFTs. Qualquer marketplace cobra uma taxa do valor de venda de cada NFT, a qual poderá ser suportada pelo comprador ou pelo vendedor, dependendo da plataforma.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GGvxJ9xOJMs4wmx6mBN0S.png?height=530&width=1127)

De modo a poderes comprar um NFT, precisarás de dispor na tua carteira digital da criptomoeda associada à blockchain onde o token está alojado.

### Marketplaces

Neste momento, os seguintes 3 mercados permitem-te criar e vender NFTs de forma gratuita:

* **Rarible** ([ref](https://archive.ph/Qd8Oa))
* **Mintable**
* [OpenSea](https://opensea.io/)

Apps que sigo:

[https://opensea.io/](https://opensea.io/)

[https://rarible.com/](https://rarible.com/)

[https://apollo42.app/](https://apollo42.app/)

[https://galacticway.io/](https://galacticway.io/)

[https://zora.co/](https://zora.co/)

[https://solsea.io/](https://solsea.io/)

[https://mintable.app/](https://mintable.app/)

title: O que são NFTs?
body:
## Definição

A tecnologia dos NFTs, **Non-Fungible Tokens**, foi creada em 2017 através de contratos inteligentes na blockchain Ethereum. No início de 2021, os NFTs entram de repente em destaque no mundo das criptomoedas e tecnologia subjacente (blockchain).

Um NFT é um tipo de token. **Mas o que são tokens?**

**Tokens** são unidades virtuais que confirmam a posse de certo activo digital. Os tokens operam com base na tecnologia blockchain, aquela que está na base das criptomoedas. Para entender melhor os conceitos **blockchain** e **criptomoeda**, recomendo a leitura deste artigo:

[https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ](https://mirror.xyz/0x2DBF911D78815D995B05bc8FA42e378f78D7CC7b/0vQjECsvCIYUAkSbXuKWo3Jncbsg3ZiaaS0-2fraLnQ)

Entre todos os tokens existentes (mais de 13 000 neste momento - o site [Coingecko](https://www.coingecko.com/) chama-os todos de ‘Coins’, mas na realidade só alguns são moedas) há alguns que se chamam moedas. Uma moeda, ou criptomoeda, é semelhante a uma moeda física, e é um token nativo de certa blockchain. Cada blockchain só tem uma moeda, mas pode ter vários tokens. As moedas tipicamente têm o mesmo nome da blockchain onde operam. Por exemplo, [SOLANA](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solana) (SOL) é a moeda da blockchain Solana, e [SOLCIAL](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/solcial) (SLCL) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Por exemplo, [ETHEREUM ou ETHER](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum) (ETH) é a moeda da blockchain Ethereum, e [BASIC ATTENTION TOKEN](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/basic-attention-token) (BAT) é um token que opera nessa mesma blockchain. Note-se que tokens que não sejam nativos, i.e não sejam moedas, podem existir em várias blockchains, como é o caso do BAT (tal facto está indicado no campo ‘Contract’, menu **…**, em **Info** - ver link acima).

Os portadores de tokens podem, além de os guardar nas suas carteiras digitais, trocá-los por outros tokens em casas de cambio online, vendê-los (NFTs) em *marketplaces*, oferecê-los, ou usá-los para comprar algo. Existem vários tipos de tokens, entre os quais destaco:

* **Pagamento** – usado para efectuar transações financeiras no mundo digital (moedas como Solana, Cardano, Bitcoin, Ethereum).
* **Utilitário** – usado para dar acesso a produtos ou serviços baseados em alguma blockchain.

  Todos os tipos anteriores são **fungíveis** (*fungible tokens*), ou seja, podem ser trocados por algo de valor igual – 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa A vale o mesmo que 1 Bitcoin na mão da pessoa B, ou seja, se as pessoas trocarem as moedas o cenário não se altera. Tal não se passa com os NFTs, pois cada um é único. Diz-se por isso que são **não-fungíveis**.
* **NFT** – certificados digitais únicos de trabalhos originais, onde o criador original terá sempre controlo sobre a forma como o trabalho é licensiado. São compostos por vários elementos, tais como:
  * **conteúdo digital** que representa – ficheiro de imagem, audio, texto, ou vídeo.
  * **criador** – identificação do criador do token.
  * **proprietário** – identificação do actual proprietário do token, o qual será ainda o criador se o token não tiver sido oferecido ou vendido.
  * **preço ou ofertas**, caso esteja à venda ou em leilão.
  * **metadados** – informações sobre o activo digital, como assinatura do criador, descrição, tipo de ficheiro, resolução, histórico de transações, data e hora da sua criação, …

Outra diferença entre **NFTs** e tokens fungíveis (como moedas, por exemplo) é a **indivisibilidade** dos primeiros. Por exemplo, poderás enviar 0.05 Bitcoins a um amigo, mas não poderás fazer o mesmo com 5% de um NFT.

## Valor

Se todos os criadores digitais publicarem os seus novos trabalhos, originais, como NFT, todo aquele que tentar copiar o seu trabalho e certificá-lo como NFT, muito dificilmente terá o seu trabalho reconhecido como original. Isto porque existem mecanismos (e cada vez existirão mais) para saber se certo conteúdo digital já foi publicado mais que uma vez na web como NFT (e.g, vários marketplaces fazem essa fiscalização, em breve existirão **motores de busca de NFTs** – ver websites em baixo, e poderás usar o [motor de busca da Google](https://images.google.com/) para saber a localização de certo ficheiro de imagem).

[https://nftsearch.site/](https://nftsearch.site/)

**Nota**: *se ainda não existir na base de dados, deverás/poderás adicionar o NFT que procuras à mesma*.

[https://hebys.io/](https://hebys.io/)

[https://nftlab.com/](https://nftlab.com/)

[https://nooft.io/](https://nooft.io/)

Regra geral, é possível salvar ou copiar o conteúdo digital de um NFT, seja uma imagem, vídeo, áudio ou documento, mas nunca será possível copiar o NFT. Esse terá sempre um único proprietário. Uma pessoa que crie um NFT com base na cópia  (ficheiro, screenshot) do conteúdo digital de outro NFT, terá sempre em sua posse um NFT distinto, publicado em data posterior à do original.

> *Markets for traditional art and collectibles are thriving despite forgeries, and the issue is even smaller with NFTs* ([ref](https://archive.ph/ptRTw))

Os NFTs podem ser programados para permitir ao criador/autor arrecadar dinheiro sempre que o NFT for vendido, normalmente entre 2.5% a 10% do preço de venda.

## Como Criar e Comercializar?

Qualquer pessoa pode criar algo digitalmente, transformá-lo num NFT em alguma blockchain (processo chamado ‘Minting’ em Inglês), e colocar esse token para venda em algum *marketplace* online. Alguns locais cobram para publiar os teus NFTs. Qualquer marketplace cobra uma taxa do valor de venda de cada NFT, a qual poderá ser suportada pelo comprador ou pelo vendedor, dependendo da plataforma.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GGvxJ9xOJMs4wmx6mBN0S.png?height=530&width=1127)

De modo a poderes comprar um NFT, precisarás de dispor na tua carteira digital da criptomoeda associada à blockchain onde o token está alojado.

### Marketplaces

Neste momento, os seguintes 3 mercados permitem-te criar e vender NFTs de forma gratuita:

title: Web3's Language Problem
body:
![It's time web3 divests from stale colonialist words like frontier, jungle, and pioneer.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/gIXQbINNZVMpkveyqLotv.png?height=2251&width=4001&&size=large)

If the promise of web3 is in fact truly revolutionary then let’s start with how we talk about it.

There’s a family of words floating around web3 that people are using to talk about the current state of the web’s third act. I’m talking about words like pioneer, frontier, settler, wilderness, explorer, and the like. We choose these words to convey the felt sensation of thrill, of simultaneously building as we’re discovering what it is we’re building. But these words are not only trite, they’re also the language of violence for many us who are actively building this space. **Which is why web3 needs to reimagine its language.**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m-hX7tRv7UdAlLtkVG7Ij.png?height=2251&width=4001)

It makes sense that we experience emotional resonance with these words - we are working backwards from centuries of imperialist colonialist storytelling after all. These words evoke cellular-level ancestral remembrances of adventure, exploration, high risk with high reward...but at who’s expense?

We already know how this story arcs. We’re witnessing it continue to unfold in real time, IRL.

I recently attended a DAO town hall where the analogy of walking through the jungle together was invoked throughout the call. I happen to have ancestral connections to an IRL place that colonizers violently oppressed in the 1500s. Upon arrival to our shores, they may have said similar things about my homeland as they navigated through our tropical paradise. (Think about it: these people were *mission*aries.)

People will talk about making web3 accessible and inclusive to people with “marginalized identities,” and then say the words “new frontier” in the same breath. Actually hold up, **can we also stop using the word marginalized?** We, the marginalized are actually the global majority, and I believe we are the web3 majority as well.

There is a rich opportunity to find new words to talk about what we’re building, and how we’re building it. Nature and organic systems have so much to teach us about this. Mycelium networks, fractals, ecosystems. There is language available to us that is non-extractive. We just have to **tap into our fertile imaginations to find words that are precise, evocative, and that fully divest from the stale colonialist language of times past.**

Let’s not repeat the mistakes of web2 and all that came before. We have the opportunity to shape the culture of web3 by shaping the language of web3. LFG 🕺🏻

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/l7nzooKDNjU-I-RRwiOa3.png?height=2250&width=4001)
